summary: A Thieves Guild retex inspired by Nightingale Prime.
descriptionHtml:
Inspired by Zerofrost\'s Nightingale Prime
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1896

The goal with this retex is to make it feel like an accomplishment when you receive your guild master armor for the Thieves Guild. The vanilla makes you feel like the king of the hobos.

The leader and recruits armor use the same normal/specular maps for the hands, feet, and head, so I will need some time to figure out how to make a complete set of each, sharing maps. For now, you have the option to use the same retex on the Leader armor, the Recruit armor, or both.



Note: Due to other engagements (and other games) I do not plan on updating this or any of my other mods, indefinitely. At a later date, my interest in Skyrim may come back but until then, please do not leave impatient comments about updates or fixes.
author: Valstein0

files.name: Thieves Guild Leader and Recruit v1

files.name: Male Leader and Recruit v1_1 - Med Res
files.fileName: Male Leader and Recruit v1_1 - Med Res-2577-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Added normal/specular maps for Hood, Gloves, and Boots (shared by Guild leader and members)
Added first retex of guild member armor
Darkened metal on Leader armor and added stitching
Option for Full or Medium resolution textures.
